text: REAP may refer to: ==Government and organisations== * Reserve Educational Assistance Program, Chapter 1607 (G.I. Bill of Rights), a Department of Defense education benefit program * Re-Engineering Assessment Practices, one of six projects funded under the Scottish Funding Council's E-learning Transformation Programme * Resource and Energy Analysis Programme, a specialist programme of the Stockholm Environment Institute * Rice Exporters Association of Pakistan, a Pakistani business association ==Other uses== * Rounding Errors in Algebraic Processes, a mathematical book by James H. Wilkinson published in 1963 ==See also== *Reaper (disambiguation) *Reaping (disambiguation) * *
title: Reap
